    drilldown transition property to use for animating menus.

    variables

    drilldown-arrows

    $drilldown-arrows: true !default;

    Description

    Adds arrows to drilldown items with submenus

    drilldown-arrow-color

    $drilldown-arrow-color: #333 !default;

    Description

    Sets drilldown arrow color if arrow is used.

    drilldown-background

    $drilldown-background: #fff !default;

    Description

    Background color for drilldown submenus.

    px-table-view

    csss

    ///Variables /// @group px-table-view @import "_variables.scss"; @import "px-mobile-design/sass/_mixins.scss"; ///------------------------------------------------------ /// @access public /// @group px-table-view @mixin pxFonts()

    @css ///Variables
/// @group px-table-view
@import "_variables.scss";
@import "px-mobile-design/sass/_mixins.scss";

///------------------------------------------------------
/// @access public
/// @group px-table-view
@mixin pxFonts()() { ... }

    Ungrouped

    mixins

    pxFonts

    @mixin pxFonts() { ... }

    Description

    @access public @group px-table-view

    Parameters

    None.

    Content

    This mixin allows extra content to be passed (through the @content directive).

    Requires

    • [variable] font-family-default
    • [variable] font-weight

    variables

    font-family-default

    $font-family-default: "GE Inspira Sans", sans-serif !default;

    Description

    Type

    Used by

    • [mixin] pxFonts

    [private] font-size-default

    $font-size-default: calculateRem(16px) !default;

    [private] font-weight

    $font-weight: 500 !default;

    Used by

    • [mixin] pxFonts
